SourceAnalyzer.Name: Layout Rules
SourceAnalyzer.Description: Rules which enforce Mark's coding best practices.

Rule.Name: NoTrailingWhitespace
Rule.Context: The last character of a line must not be whitespace.
Rule.Description: Those tabs and spaces add precious bytes.

Rule.Name: FileMustEndWithNewline
Rule.Context: The last line of a source file contain a newline.
Rule.Description: Validates that the file ends with a newline.

Rule.Name: MaximumLineLengthExceeded
Rule.Context: Line length must not exceed 120 characters.
Rule.Description: Brevity is virtue. Virtue is strength.

Rule.Name: DoNotUseVarKeyword
Rule.Context: Use of the var keyword is disallowed.
Rule.Description: Use the full name of the target class, or 'object' if an anonymous object.
